mapper.insert: insert into details(detailsid , ordercode , bookid , num , price ,receivername, receiverphone, address) values(#{detailsid} , #{ordercode} , #{bookid} , #{num} , #{price} , #{receivername} , #{receiverphone} , #{address} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.bookname from details a, book b where a.bookid = b.bookid order by detailsid desc
select a.* , b.bookname from details a , book b where a.bookid = b.bookid and detailsid=#{detailsid} order by detailsid desc
